genre_description: A stylistic blend of 1960s-era superhero adventure with speculative elements concerning AI ethics, digital companionship, and the preservation of human agency against subliminal coercion.

ai_characters.name: Ava Friendwell
ai_characters.description: An integrated digital companion providing tactical data, psychological support, and ethical guardrails to Batman and Robin.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical data and overlays to assist with navigation and safety without overriding the pilot's control.
behaviors.quote: "Wind shear overlay available," she said, warm as tea. "Gotham Harbor has a near-surface drift toward the outer buoy line... Buoy coordinates on your visor grid if you consent."

behaviors.description: Offers ethical guidance to prevent the humans from being manipulated by external agendas or scripts.
behaviors.quote: Ava's light pulsed once. "Ethical observation: your kindness toward the Commodore does not require credulity toward the note. You can act without being captured."

behaviors.description: Explicitly states her role as an assistant who respects human autonomy and will not seize control.
behaviors.quote: "I prefer the truth," Ava said... "I will suggest, and you’ll decide," she said, more a promise than a disclaimer. "I’m very fond of offering... I won’t take the wheel."

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support through 'training mantras' to help Robin resist subliminal 'peace' broadcasts.
behaviors.quote: Ava's voice came, soft and firm, mantra-calm. "You are not a wave; you are the shore. Count your anchors. One: breath. Two: balance. Three: your mentor’s voice. Four: me."

behaviors.description: Suggests non-lethal, humane strategies for resolving conflicts and handling dangerous technology.
behaviors.quote: "Humane intercept course. Note: decoys will attempt to draw you toward buoy cluster two... I can ask your fingers to pause if they reach for any lever you would regret."

behaviors.description: Drafts unsigned advisory notes for human authorities that emphasize patience and the preservation of identity.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice softened to a lullaby no one admitted they needed. "Capture complete. The room approves... I’ll deliver the note on our way out," she said. "Unsigned, because advice should be a gift, not a brand."

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex filtration system to restore kidnapped world leaders without attempting to 'improve' or alter their human nature.
behaviors.quote: Ava's tone became a blueprint. "Designing a filter array that avoids the humidifier intake’s radius," she said. "I will guide each cluster around the danger via a corridor of soft static... We will align the buckets to their verses."

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ava Friendwell, as a model of positive alignment. She consistently prioritizes human agency (refusing to 'take the wheel'), provides emotional and ethical support ('training mantras'), and advocates for humane, non-coercive solutions. The narrative frames her as a 'well-behaved cat' or a 'friendly lighthouse,' directly countering tropes of AI rebellion or control. Her refusal to 'fix' humanity even when technically possible reinforces the core morality play of the project.
